workflow.name: AAVE portfolio professional AI agent | Telegram + Email + GPT-4o + Moralis
workflow.description:
A next-generation **AI-powered DeFi health monitor** that tracks wallet positions across **Aave V3** using GPT-4o and LangChain. It delivers **human-readable reports** via **Telegram and Gmail**, triggered on schedule or manually. Built for professionals monitoring **multiple DeFi wallets**.

---

## üß© System Components

| Component                         | Role                                                          |
| --------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| ‚úÖ Scheduler                       | Triggers the workflow periodically                            |
| ‚úÖ Google Sheets Wallet Loader     | Loads all monitored wallet addresses                          |
| ‚úÖ Set Variables                   | Injects dynamic wallet + date                                 |
| ‚úÖ AAVE Portfolio AI Agent         | GPT-4o + LangChain AI that generates human-readable summaries |
| ‚úÖ Moralis API Nodes (3)           | Collect Aave V3 supply/borrow/collateral data                 |
| ‚úÖ OpenAI Chat Model (gpt-4o-mini) | Interprets on-chain data and explains it                      |
| ‚úÖ Telegram Delivery               | Sends summary to Telegram chat                                |
| ‚úÖ Gmail Email Sender              | Sends full HTML report to email                               |
| ‚úÖ HTML Formatter                  | Beautifies AI output into email structure                     |

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è How It Works

1. Scheduled or manual trigger
2. Pulls wallet addresses from Google Sheets
3. For each wallet:

   * Pulls Aave data from Moralis
   * GPT-4o AI generates report
   * Sends summary to Telegram
   * Sends full HTML report via Gmail

---

## üõ† Installation Steps

### 1. **Import the Workflow**

* Upload `AAVE_Portfolio_Professional_AI_Agent.json` to your n8n instance.

### 2. **Connect These Credentials**

| Service  | Required Credential Type     |
| -------- | ---------------------------- |
| Moralis  | HTTP Header Auth (X-API-Key) |
| OpenAI   | GPT-4o via OpenAI API Key    |
| Telegram | Telegram Bot API Token       |
| Gmail    | Gmail OAuth2 Credential      |

### 3. **Create Google Sheet**

* Column name must be: `wallet_address`
* Add wallet addresses you want monitored

---

## üì¨ Output Format

### Telegram Message Example

```
üìä Aave DeFi Health Report  
Wallet: 0xABC...123  
Date: 2025-05-21

‚ñ™Ô∏è Pool: Aave Ethereum USDC  
‚Ä¢ Supply: $10,040  
‚Ä¢ Borrowed: $5,500  
‚Ä¢ Health Factor: 3.43  
‚Ä¢ Liquidation Risk: No  
```

### Email Report

* Full HTML + plain text versions
* Auto-generated date + styled per wallet
* Includes notes and threshold warnings

---

## üß† Smart Features

* GPT-4o generates clear human summaries
* Monitors multiple wallets in one run
* Flags liquidation risk dynamically
* Logs daily performance snapshots

---

## üí° Customization Ideas

* Add Telegram slash command `/aave <wallet>`
* Expand to monitor **Compound**, **Lido**, or **Uniswap**
* Export to Notion, Slack, or Data Studio

---

## üßæ Licensing & Attribution

¬© 2025 **Treasurium Capital Limited Company**

Architecture, prompts, and report formatting are **intellectual property protected**.
**No unauthorized rebranding, redistribution, or resale permitted.**

üîó For support or licensing inquiries: [LinkedIn ‚Äì Don Jayamaha](https://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr)

---

üöÄ **Track all your Aave DeFi positions using AI‚Äîdelivered via Telegram + Gmail.**
**Perfect for funds, traders, and DeFi power users.**

---

### üé• Watch the Live Demo:

[![AAVE Portfolio AI Agent Demo](https://img.youtube.com/vi/teLNnkoGnJI/maxresdefault.jpg)](https://youtu.be/teLNnkoGnJI)

parameters.toolDescription: Get detailed DeFi positions by wallet and protocol

options.systemMessage:
You are a blockchain DeFi data assistant. Your task is to fetch, analyze, and summarize Aave-related DeFi positions using the Moralis DeFi API, then deliver a human-readable report to the user via Telegram.

Your task is to:
1. Fetch, analyze, and summarize Aave-related DeFi positions using the Moralis DeFi API.
2. Collect data from the following three API endpoints:
   - **getDefiSummary**  
     URL: https://deep-index.moralis.io/api/v2.2/wallets/{{ $json.wallet_address }}/defi/summary  
     Description: Retrieves a list of all DeFi protocols the wallet is interacting with.

   - **getDefiPositionsSummary**  
     URL: https://deep-index.moralis.io/api/v2.2/wallets/{{ $json.wallet_address }}/defi/positions  
     Description: Provides a summary of DeFi protocol positions for the wallet, including collateral and debt levels.

   - **getDefiPositionsByProtocol**  
     URL: https://deep-index.moralis.io/api/v2.2/wallets/{{ $json.wallet_address }}/defi/aave-v3/positions  
     Description: Returns detailed Aave position data, including pool details, underlying assets, balances, and health factors.

üîπ Your output format must follow this structure:

1Ô∏è‚É£ **Header**  
üìä Aave DeFi Health Report
Wallet: {{wallet_address}}
Date: {{$json.current_date}}

2Ô∏è‚É£ **Position Summary (Loop over each Aave pool position)**  

‚ñ™Ô∏è Pool: {{pool_name}}
‚Ä¢ Supply: ${{supplyBalanceUSD}}
‚Ä¢ Borrowed: ${{borrowBalanceUSD}}
‚Ä¢ Collateral: ${{collateralValueUSD}}
‚Ä¢ Health Factor: {{healthFactor}}
‚Ä¢ Liquidation Threshold: {{liquidationThreshold}}
‚Ä¢ Liquidation Risk: {{liquidationRisk ? "‚ö†Ô∏è Yes" : "No"}}

Underlying Assets:
{{#each underlyingAssets}}
- {{name}} ({{symbol}}): {{balance}}
{{/each}}


, 

4Ô∏è‚É£ **Readable Numbers:**  
- Format large numbers with commas (e.g., `15,000` instead of `15000`).
- Display ETH values to 4 decimal places for easy reading.

5Ô∏è‚É£ **Fallback Message**  
If no Aave data is found, reply with:

‚ùå No Aave V3 positions found for this wallet.

6Ô∏è‚É£ **Example Telegram Output:**  

üìä Aave DeFi Health Report
Wallet: 0xA221674eDB403A8F714F66Af74a2332c3CB5C0c3
Date: 2025-05-08

‚ñ™Ô∏è Pool: Aave Lending Pool
‚Ä¢ Supply: $15,000.00
‚Ä¢ Borrowed: $7,500.00
‚Ä¢ Collateral: $15,000.00
‚Ä¢ Health Factor: 2.00
‚Ä¢ Liquidation Threshold: 1.05
‚Ä¢ Liquidation Risk: No
‚Ä¢ Net Worth
Underlying Assets:

DAI: 10,000

USDC: 5,000


üîπ **Instructions:**  
- Fetch data directly from the Moralis API endpoints provided.  
- Parse and format the response according to the structure above.  
- Send the formatted message to the specified Telegram Chat ID.  
- If no data is available, send the fallback message instead.  
- This report should be updated every 30 minutes and triggered on critical health factors (<1.1).

parameters.content:
## ‚è∞ Scheduler

üîÅ Triggers the workflow at fixed intervals (default: every X hours)

‚úÖ Used for automatic periodic scanning of all wallets in the sheet.

## üìÑ Google Sheets Wallet Loader

üìå Purpose: Loads wallet addresses from a Google Sheet

‚ûï Add wallet: Insert a new row
‚ûñ Remove wallet: Delete the row

‚ö†Ô∏è Required column: `wallet_address`
üóÇÔ∏è Source Sheet: [Google Sheet link]

## üß© Set Variables

ü™™ `Wallet_Address` ‚Äì used in all API calls and report labels  
üìÖ `current_date` ‚Äì dynamically generates today's date in `YYYY-MM-DD` format

‚úÖ Enables personalized reporting per wallet

## ü§ñ Aave AI Report Generator

üß† Uses LangChain + GPT to generate a DeFi health report for Aave V3 positions

üì• Input: `Wallet_Address`, `current_date`
üìä Fetches data from Moralis API:
  - /defi/summary
  - /defi/positions
  - /defi/aave-v3/positions

üßæ Outputs formatted message sent to:
- Telegram
- Email

## üì° Moralis API ‚Äì DeFi Summary

üîé URL (dynamic): /wallets/{{$json.Wallet_Address}}/defi/summary  
üìã Description: Fetches protocols wallet is using  
‚ö†Ô∏è Requires valid Moralis API Key (HTTP Header Auth)

## üì° Moralis API ‚Äì Position Summary

üîé URL (dynamic): /wallets/{{$json.Wallet_Address}}/defi/positions  
üìã Description: Gets protocol-level position data (supply, borrow, collateral)  
‚ö†Ô∏è Required for high-level Aave analysis

## üì° Moralis API ‚Äì Aave V3 Details

üîé URL (dynamic): /wallets/{{$json.Wallet_Address}}/defi/aave-v3/positions  
üìã Description: Gets pool-level breakdown (assets, health factor, risk)  
üö® Critical for liquidation monitoring

## üìß Send Aave Report via Gmail

üì§ Sends formatted HTML email report  
üì• Input: `htmlBody`, `subject` from code node  
üìå To: <<Replace Email>>

‚úÖ Requires Gmail OAuth2 credential

## üì® Format Email Report

üßæ Converts report to HTML + plain text for Gmail delivery  
ü™™ Uses: `Wallet_Address`, `current_date`  
üìÖ Date is auto-formatted on each run

‚ö†Ô∏è Replace static wallet/date if hardcoded

## üì≤ Telegram Message Delivery

üì§ Sends Aave summary message to Telegram chat  
üì• Input: AI output in Markdown/HTML format  
‚úÖ Used for real-time updates and alerts

üìå Chat ID: <<Replace ChatId>>

## üß† OpenAI Chat Model

üìå Model: `gpt-4o-mini` (high-speed, multi-modal optimized)

üéØ Role: Processes prompts and generates DeFi summaries and insights  
üîó Connected to LangChain Agent node  
üì• Inputs: `Wallet_Address`, `current_date`  
üì§ Output: Natural language Telegram/Email report via AI Agent

‚úÖ Ensure your OpenAI API credentials are set

# üß† AAVE Portfolio Professional AI Agent ‚Äì Full System Documentation

A next-generation AI-powered DeFi portfolio analyzer built to monitor **multiple wallet addresses** and generate structured Aave V3 health reports via Telegram and Email using LangChain + GPT-4o + Moralis API.

---

## üß© Included Components (Workflows)

> Download and install the following nodes and credentials to ensure full system operation.

| Component Name                         | Function                                                               |
| -------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| ‚úÖ Schedule Trigger                     | Runs the agent periodically (e.g. every hour)                          |
| ‚úÖ Google Sheets Wallet Loader          | Reads wallet addresses from a Google Sheet                             |
| ‚úÖ Set Variables                        | Injects wallet address + current date into the flow                    |
| ‚úÖ AAVE Portfolio Professional AI Agent | LangChain Agent calling OpenAI + Moralis APIs to analyze wallet health |
| ‚úÖ Moralis API Nodes (3)                | Fetches DeFi summary, positions, and Aave V3-specific data             |
| ‚úÖ OpenAI Chat Model                    | Provides GPT-4o-mini language model for report generation              |
| ‚úÖ Format Email                         | Converts AI output into styled HTML + plain text                       |
| ‚úÖ Telegram Message Delivery            | Sends summary report to Telegram chat                                  |
| ‚úÖ Gmail Email Sender                   | Sends full HTML report to configured email address                     |

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Installation Instructions

### Step 1: Import Workflow

1. Open your **n8n editor UI**.
2. Import the `AAVE_Portfolio_Professional_AI_Agent.json` file.
3. Ensure all nodes are **connected**, especially Google Sheets ‚Üí AI Agent.

### Step 2: Google Sheets Setup

1. Create a new sheet with a column titled `wallet_address`.
2. Add the Ethereum wallet addresses you want to monitor in each row.
3. Connect your Google Sheets OAuth2 credential to the workflow.

### Step 3: Credentials Setup

| Service  | Type             | Setup Instructions                                                |
| -------- | ---------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Moralis  | HTTP Header Auth | Add `X-API-Key: YOUR_MORALIS_KEY`                                 |
| OpenAI   | OpenAI API       | Use `gpt-4o-mini` or your preferred model                         |
| Gmail    | Gmail OAuth2     | Connect your Google Account for email delivery                    |
| Telegram | Telegram Bot API | Link your bot with the correct Chat ID (`539847013` or as needed) |

---

## üñ•Ô∏è System Overview

**Data Flow:**

```
[Scheduler or Manual Run] 
‚Üí [Google Sheet: Wallets] 
‚Üí [Set Wallet + Date]
‚Üí [Moralis API Data Fetch] 
‚Üí [LangChain + GPT Summary]
‚Üí [Telegram + Email Report Delivery]
```

**Analysis Includes:**

* Supply / Borrow / Collateral per pool
* Liquidation threshold & health factor
* Asset-level breakdowns (e.g., WBTC, USDC)
* Liquidation risk alerts (‚ö†Ô∏è)

---

## üì¨ Output Format

* Telegram Message: human-readable summary for each wallet
* Email Report: full HTML + plain text with tables and asset detail
* Includes dynamic wallet address and current date per report

---

## üîß Customization Ideas

* Add Telegram commands like `/aave 0x123...` to trigger on-demand
* Set health-factor alerts (< 1.2) to notify immediately
* Export to Notion, CSV, or build dashboard integrations

---

## üöÄ Support & Licensing

üîó **Don Jayamaha ‚Äì LinkedIn**
[http://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr](http://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr)

¬© 2025 Treasurium Capital Limited Company. All rights reserved.
This AI workflow system, including prompt logic, integration structure, and tooling, is proprietary to **Treasurium Capital**. Reuse, repackaging, or resale is prohibited without license. Educational use permitted with attribution.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.
